author: Whizfortune
title: The Benefits of Custom Software Development for Your Business
excerpt: We have always known the power of digital, and we've mastered the strategy, tactics, and technology to harness it. Now, other departments have had to embrace the digital transformation that businesses have been talking about for so long.
body:
In today’s rapidly evolving business environment, having a competitive edge can be the key to success. One of the most effective ways to achieve this is through custom software development. By creating tailored solutions to meet the specific needs of your business, you can enhance your operational efficiency, boost productivity, and stay ahead of the competition.
Here are some of the key benefits of custom software development &col

1. Tailored to Your Specific Needs: Off-the-shelf software may not always meet the specific needs of your business. By opting for custom software development, you can have a solution that is specifically designed to meet the unique needs of your organization. This means that you can optimize your workflows and streamline your operations, making your business more efficient and effective.
2. Enhanced Security: Cybersecurity threats are a major concern for businesses of all sizes. Off-the-shelf software may have vulnerabilities that could be exploited by cybercriminals, putting your business at risk. Custom software development can ensure that your systems are built with security in mind, reducing the risk of data breaches and other cyber-attacks.
3. Scalability: As your business grows, so do your software requirements. Custom software development can ensure that your systems are scalable, allowing you to add new features and functionality as your business expands.
4. Increased Productivity: By automating routine tasks and streamlining workflows, custom software can help increase productivity and reduce the time and resources required to complete tasks. This frees up your team to focus on more high-value activities, such as developing new products or improving customer service. In conclusion, custom software development can provide businesses with numerous benefits, from improved efficiency and productivity to enhanced security and scalability. If you’re looking to gain a competitive edge in today’s business environment, custom software development may be the solution you need.

author: Whizfortune
title: The six things marketers need to understand about DTC marketing
excerpt: Beautiful and usable design can be the deciding factor between a successful and a failing business. Great designers are treated like superstars. And it’s so fulfilling to design beautiful things that people love to use.
body: We have always known the power of digital, and we have mastered the strategy, tactics, and technology to harness it. Now, other departments have had to embrace the digital transformation that busine- sses have been talking about for so long, and those colleagues are turning to us in Marketing to provide guidance.
Even if it is a brave new world for everyone else, for marketers it is another day in the proverbial office.

Now, the digital evolution is resonating across organizations. The pandemic has shifted internal structures and changed relationships with customers, and as a result marketers have become more valuable than ever.
The Shift Inside Organizations: Marketers Become Indispensable in a Digital World.

Marketing has often been known as the department that makes PowerPoints and polishes websites. That was not ever close to the whole truth, of course, but past company structures — in which Marketing always played second fiddle to Sales — allowed that falsehood to persist.

The pandemic has transformed what the marketing team means to an organization: It is given us agency. It is upended the customer journey. It is redefined how sales and marketing teams should interact. And it is forced businesses to see the value that marketers provide in a digital world.
